newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Feb first 20 days trade surplus up 53.3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Japan Feb first 20 days trade surplus up 53.3 pct.

text.p: Japan's customs-cleared trade surplus rose 53.3 percent to 197.33 billion yen in the first 20 days of February compared with a revised surplus of 128.70 billion yen in the same period a year earlier, the Finance Ministry said on Wednesday.
Free-on-board (FOB) exports rose 15.2 percent to 2.52 trillion yen from a year earlier, while cost, insurance and freight (CIF) imports rose 12.8 percent to 2.33 trillion yen.
